Name: Streetball VR
About the game: The classic streetball arcade sport is back! Experience the pleasure of basketball when you step into the street one on one with the top finest in basketball action and play in different streets with beautiful backgrounds in VR. Practice your skills or take your talents and break the time record with your acrobatic jams and an astonishing display of skills. You can spank the basketball with special skills and acrobatic moves and score a point in real-time. Whether you want to play against the computer or enjoy with others for high scores, you are rest assured of a more entertaining blast! Game Features 3 Maps 4 Various colored balls 2 Game Modes: Practice and Time Mode 32 Hip Hop Tracks Free Soundtrack
